sourcesContent:
import { Layout, Menu } from 'antd'
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import {Link, Route} from 'react-router-dom'
import ArtistList from './ArtistList';

const { Content, Sider } = Layout;
const {SubMenu} = Menu;

export default class ArtistCat extends Component {
    componentDidMount() {
        var linkObj = document.getElementById('hot');
        linkObj.click();
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <Layout>
                <Sider style={{width: 250}}>
                    <Menu mode="inline" defaultSelectedKeys="hot" style={{height: '100%'}}>
                        <Menu.Item key="hot">
                            <Link to="/artist_list?artistType=hot" id="hot">热门歌手</Link>
                        </Menu.Item>
                        <SubMenu key="华语" title="华语">
                            <Menu.Item key="male">
                                <Link to="/artist_list?artistLocation=0&artistType=0">华语男歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="female">
                                <Link to="/artist_list?artistLocation=0&artistType=1">华语女歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="group">
                                <Link to="/artist_list?artistLocation=0&artistType=2">华语组合/乐队</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                        </SubMenu>
                        <SubMenu key="欧美" title="欧美">
                            <Menu.Item key="male">
                                <Link to="/artist_list?artistLocation=1&artistType=0">欧美男歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="female">
                                <Link to="/artist_list?artistLocation=1&artistType=1">欧美女歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="group">
                                <Link to="/artist_list/1/2">欧美组合/乐队</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                        </SubMenu>
                        <SubMenu key="日韩" title="日韩">
                            <Menu.Item key="male">
                                <Link to="/artist_list/2/0">日韩男歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="female">
                                <Link to="/artist_list/2/1">日韩女歌手</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                            <Menu.Item key="group">
                                <Link to="/artist_list/2/2">日韩组合/乐队</Link>
                            </Menu.Item>
                        </SubMenu>
                    </Menu>
                </Sider>
                <Content style={{ padding: '0 15px', minHeight: 280}}>
                    <Route path="/artist_list/:artistLocation/:artistType" component={ArtistList} />
                </Content>
            </Layout>
        )
    }
}
